rows.label: bf02190100_0010
rows.name:
The boy and his Blade who seemed to
be working with them got away...

rows.label: bf02190100_0020
rows.name:
But we apprehended the girl from the
wanted poster, along with her Blade!

rows.label: bf02190100_0030
rows.name: The town is once again safe for-

rows.label: bf02190100_0040
rows.name:
Say, Pax, do you remember what my
orders were?

rows.label: bf02190100_0050
rows.name: Sir?

rows.label: bf02190100_0060
rows.name:
I told you to capture the Blade with
the emerald Core Crystal, did I not?

rows.label: bf02190100_0070
rows.name:
Do you recall me ever telling you
to capture some little girl

rows.label: bf02190100_0080
rows.name: with barely a bounty on her head?

rows.label: bf02190100_0090
rows.name: B-but sir, she's a member of Iira-

rows.label: bf02190100_0100
rows.name:
I'll say it slowly for you, just so we're clear.
Get. The Blade. With. The emerald-

rows.label: bf02190100_0110
rows.name: Um, Consul Morph, sir?

rows.label: bf02190100_0120
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf02190100_0130
rows.name:
I-I'm not exactly sure what
color "emerald" is supposed to be...

rows.label: bf02190100_0140
rows.name:
Agh! Give me strength! It's green, you idiot!
Emerald is green!

rows.label: bf02190100_0150
rows.name: Like this! Green! Get it, you clod?

rows.label: bf02190100_0160
rows.name:
Ohhh, GREEN!
I get it now. So emeralds are green, huh...

rows.label: bf02190100_0170
rows.name:
You dunderhead! How many Blades do you
see with green Core Crystals?

rows.label: bf02190100_0180
rows.name:
It's patently obvious! How do you mix THAT
Blade up with some worthless cat monster?!

rows.label: bf02190100_0190
rows.name:
Actually, sir, technically I believe
that's a tiger, rather than a-

rows.label: bf02190100_0200
rows.name: Silence!

rows.label: bf02190100_0210
rows.name: Agh!

rows.label: bf02190100_0220
rows.name: Consul!

rows.label: bf02190100_0230
rows.name:
What is it?
Haven't you heard of knocking?

rows.label: bf02190100_0240
rows.name:
My apologies, sir! It's just that
Meleph-sama has...

rows.label: bf02190100_0250
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: bf02190100_0260
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor Meleph has just arrived
from the motherland.

rows.label: bf02190100_0270
rows.name: Already?!

rows.label: bf02190100_0280
rows.name: Her ship has just docked.

rows.label: bf02190100_0290
rows.name: Grkh, this... This cannot be happening!
